description: Streamline the process of hiring new employees with automated workflows for document submission and profile creation.
Track employee working hours, overtime, and attendance records with a digital clock-in and clock-out system.
Automate salary calculations, tax deductions, and payslip generation while ensuring compliance with tax laws.
Allow employees to request leaves, view balances, and automate approval workflows for HR.
Set goals, track employee performance, and conduct 360-degree feedback for continuous improvement.
Securely store and manage employee contracts, certificates, and important documents with version control.
Facilitate internal communication with announcement boards, messaging systems, and team collaboration tools.
Generate detailed reports on workforce productivity, attendance trends, and payroll summaries.
